text: Julie Nixon Eisenhower (born July 5, 1948) in Washington, D.C. is the youngest daughter of former President of the United States Richard Nixon and former First Lady of the United States Pat Nixon. She married David Eisenhower, grandson of Dwight D. Eisenhower in 1968. She is the younger sister of Tricia Nixon Cox. The Eisenhowers have two daughters and one son: * Jennie Eisenhower (born 1978) - an actress * Alexander Richard (born 1980) * Melanie Catherine (born 1984) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Children of Presidents of the United States Category:Living people Category:1948 births Category:People from Washington, D.C.
title: Julie Nixon Eisenhower
